channel.title: I think I have a problem
channel.description:
Well, I really need some help with my java (atleast I think that's the problem). Whenever I try to open a private server's .bat file, it says [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I am able to play RuneScape, but everyone knows how boring RS is. I downloaded JDK6.17, and I installed it with 0 problems. I just really wanted to know if someone could help me, because I REALLY want to play Private Servers again, and this computer is my only option.
If you need to know anything else, just ask. :)
Thanks SOO much. (PS: If this is in the wrong section, can you move it to the right section any mods out there?)
